descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive only with The Urban Nest, this beautifully appointed 4 bedroom property stands out from the crowd.  An absolute gem of a villa, located in the heart of Victory Heights, close to the Al Fay and Estella exits.  This stunning, popular layout has a very large, open plan kitchen/dining room filled with light.  There are 2 large windows that look out onto the mature garden, the front of the house has 2 parking spots and a secluded entrance.
The kitchen is white and bright with beautiful worktops in the concrete and recycled glass creates a luxe feel.
There is a bedroom/study on the ground floor and separate bathroom which has also been completely renovated to a high standard.
The first floor comprises of 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.  The 2 bedrooms facing the front of the property share a renovated bathroom and both have ample storage and very high ceilings that truly do create a feeling of space and share an abundance of light.
The master bedroom has a lot of cupboard space and overlooks the tranquil garden.  The en suite bathroom has been modified to include a large shower unit and has been upgraded in a matching neutral palette that exudes luxury.
Outside is a pool with a heater and chiller and a private garden with a pretty border filled with healthy plants.  A perfect spot to entertain, this is an immaculate outdoor space and overall, the house feels like a Hamptons-inspired retreat with dove grey walls and white wood throughout - call me to arrange a viewing, this house is a must-see: +971507151741.']
